meta.title: LOWIS - Eat Smart | Goal: 1 kg/week minimum
meta.description: Learn to eat smart with your Moroccan recipes. No restrictions, just varying the order and combination of foods. AI + experts 24/7. 7-day free trial.

problem.title: Why do classic diets fail?
problem.subtitle: It's not your fault. The problem is the approach:

points.text: Restrictive diets impossible to maintain for more than 2 weeks
Extreme efforts that cause the yo-yo effect
Counting calories without understanding your body
Left alone without follow-up or support

problem.solution: LOWIS is different: eat smart, not less.

items.question: Do I have to follow a strict diet?
items.answer: No. LOWIS aims for lasting habits: Moroccan cuisine, smart portions, realistic adjustments. You eat your favorite dishes, just better combined.

items.question: What if I slip up one day?
items.answer: It's expected. LOWIS corrects immediately to get back on track â€” without guilt. A slip doesn't destroy your progress, we adjust together.

items.question: Is 1 kg/week minimum really possible?
items.answer: Yes, that's our baseline goal. By eating smart (not less, just better), most users lose at least 1 kg per week naturally and sustainably.

items.question: Does the app really recognize Moroccan dishes?
items.answer: Yes! Over 500 Moroccan dishes: tajines, couscous, pastilla, harira, msemen, baghrir... Each recipe analyzed precisely. You don't have to change what you eat.

items.question: How does the 7-day free trial work?
items.answer: Full access for 7 days, no credit card. At the end, continue at 149 DH/month or do nothing â€” your choice.

items.question: What's the difference with other apps?
items.answer: LOWIS = 360Â° tracking (nutrition + mental + adjustments). Instant AI + human experts weekly. Not a calorie calculator, real support adapted to Morocco.

items.question: How does it work during Ramadan?
items.answer: Special fasting plans with optimal ftour/shour distribution. The app adapts to your rhythm during the holy month.

items.question: Can I cancel anytime?
items.answer: Yes, 1-click from the app. You keep access until the end of your paid period.

items.question: Is it free?
items.answer: The 7-day trial is 100% free, no credit card required. After that, LOWIS costs 149 DH/month â€” less than a single appointment with a nutritionist. And you can cancel anytime.
